title: Driving: risks and responsibilities
brief_description: Cars have become an essential tool in most businesses and the risks and responsibilities associated with driving on the job are the primary focus of this program. Outlines the costs incurred to businesses when a car accident occurs, the benefits of a safe driving program and safe driving policy, as well as basic practices to ensure the safety of the driver, other road users, pedestrians and the car itself. Useful as a basic guide to vehicle safety for the instruction of new and learner drivers.
